sentences.sContent: The animal raised its head, suddenly alert.
sentences.sCn: 那只动物突然警觉地抬起头来。

sentences.sContent: Taking notes is one of the best ways to stay alert in lectures.
sentences.sCn: 记笔记是听课时集中注意力的最佳方法之一。

sentences.sContent: ...if the left hemisphere was staying alert to keep guard in a strange environment...

phrases.pCn: 提防；警戒著；随时准备著
紧急警报，红色警报；应急状况

remMethod.val: Red Alert (红色警戒) 是风靡全球的电脑游戏

trans.tranOther: to make someone realize something important or dangerous
giving all your attention to what is happening, being said etc
